ROW.NAME: 用电排行榜
ROW.DATDSC: select '<div align=center>'||yymm||'<div>' 月份, '<div align=right>'||round(elemny/10000,2)||'<div>' 用电量, '<div align=right>'||cnt||'<div>' 企业数 from ( select a.yymm,nvl(sum(elemny),0) elemny,count(distinct b.id) cnt from tax_eledata a,tax_company b where substr(a.yymm,0,4)=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') and a.usrid=b.ammno group by a.yymm ) order by yymm

select '<div align=center>'||yymm||'</div>' 月份, '<div align=right>'||round(taxmny/10000,2)||'</div>' 税额, '<div align=right>'||cnt||'</div>' 纳税企业数 from ( select a.yymm,nvl(sum(taxmny),0) taxmny,count(distinct a.id) cnt from tax_taxdata a where substr(a.yymm,0,4)=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') group by a.yymm ) order by yymm

ROW.NAME: 稽查任务
ROW.DATDSC: select '' 核查时间段,'' 任务号,'' 状态,'' 企业编号,'' 企业名称,'' 异常类型,'' 创建时间,'' 税管员,'<center><a href="entry.sp?grdid=MYTKD">更多...</a></center>' 操作 from dual union all select * from ( select yymm1||'~'||yymm2 稽查年月, bilid 单号, decode(stat,'1','<font color=red>未分派</font>', '2','<font color=red>未处理</font>', '3','<font color=blue>处理中</font>', '9','<font color=green>已完成</font>', '0','任务退回',(select name from SYSPROCESS p where sytid='TAXMON' and grdid='TK' and p.id=a.stat)) 状态, cmid 企业编号, cmnam 企业名称, b.name 类型, --to_char(crtdat,'dd/mm hh24:mi:ss') 创建时间, to_char(crtdat,'yyyy/mm/dd') 创建时间, tousr 税管员, '<a href="show.sp?grdid=TK&guid='||guid||'&processid='||a.stat||'">' ||decode(a.stat,'1','分派','2','处理','3','<font color=red>未完成</font>','9','查看','查看') ||'</a>' 操作 from tax_trkhdr a,V_TAX_TRKTYP b where a.tousr=(select name from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') and a.acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' and a.subtyp=b.id and a.stat like '[%stats]%' and a.stat<>'8' order by a.crtdat desc )

ROW.NAME: 我的所有事务
ROW.DATDSC: select '【'||decode(stat,'1','未分派','2','已分派','3','处理中','9','已完成')||'-'||b.name||'】 '||title||' ('||crtdat||')' name,url from ( select guid,title,to_char(crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd') crtdat,project subtyp,stat, 'show.sp?grdid=TS&guid='||guid||'&processid='||stat url from trkhdr where acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' and dtlusr='[%SYS_USRID]' union all select guid,bilid||'-'||cmnam||'('||cmid||')',to_char(crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') crtdat,subtyp,stat, 'show.sp?grdid=TK&guid='||guid||'&processid='||stat url from tax_trkhdr where tousr=(select name from usr where id='[%SYS_USRID]' and org='[%SYS_ORGID]') and stat like '[%stats]%' ) a,v_tax_trktyp b where subtyp like '[%subtyp]%' and a.subtyp=b.id order by crtdat desc,subtyp

ROW.NAME: 状态查询
ROW.DATDSC:
/*select distinct decode(stat,'2','未处理','3','已处理','9','已完成') name, 'Layout.sp?id=taxman&stats='||stat url,'' guid from tax_trkhdr */
select '未处理('||count(*)||')' name,'Layout.sp?id=taxman&stats=2' url from tax_trkhdr where stat='2' and tousr=(select name from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') union all select '处理中('||count(*)||')' name,'Layout.sp?id=taxman&stats=3' url from tax_trkhdr where stat='3' and tousr=(select name from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') union all select '已完成('||count(*)||')' name,'Layout.sp?id=taxman&stats=9' url from tax_trkhdr where stat='9' and tousr=(select name from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') union all select '企业电表维护' name,'show.sp?grdid=AMMEDIT&TAXMAN=[%SYS_USRNAM]&loaddata=1' url from dual
select id,'<li>'||name||'</li>' name,'Layout.sp?id=hydesc&cid='||id url from V_TAX_HYCLASS order by id

--select '' 单号,'' 状态,'' 企业名称,'' 供电区域,'' 类型,'' 创建时间,'' 税管员,'<center><a href="show.sp?grdid=TKDTL&BILID=&DAT1=&DAT2=&TYP=&STAT=[%FILTER]&TAXMAN=&DEPT=1">更多...</a></center>' 操作 from dual --union all select * from ( select --yymm1||'~'||yymm2 稽查年月, bilid 单号, -- decode(stat,'1','<font color=red>未分派</font>', -- '2','<font color=red>未处理</font>', -- '3','<font color=blue>处理中</font>', -- '9','<font color=green>已完成</font>') 状态, decode(stat,'0','<font color=red>未分派</font>', decode(nvl(tousr,'N'),'N','<font color=red>未分派</font>','<font color=blue>已分派</font>')) 状态, --cmid 企业编号, cmnam 企业名称, a.town 供电区域, b.name 类型, to_char(crtdat,'dd/mm hh24:mi:ss') 创建时间, tousr 税管员, decode(nvl(tousr,'N'),'N','<a href="javascript:window.showModalDialog(''show.sp?grdid=TrkSend&GUID='||a.guid||'&flag=1'',window,''scroll:no;status:no;dialogWidth:450px;dialoHeight:100px'');">分派</a>' --,'<a href="show.sp?grdid=TKDTL&BILID='||bilid||'&DAT1='||to_char(dat,'yyyy-mm')||'&DAT2='||to_char(dat,'yyyy-mm')||'&TYP=&STAT=&TAXMAN=">分派</a>' ,'<a href="show.sp?grdid=TK&guid='||guid||'&action=query">查看</a>') 操作 from tax_trkhdr a,V_TAX_TRKTYP b where a.todept in (select deptid from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') and a.acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' and a.subtyp=b.id [%FILTER] order by a.crtdat desc,a.bilid )

ROW.NAME: 核算组桌面状态
ROW.DATDSC:
/*select distinct decode(stat,'2','未处理','3','已处理','9','已完成') name, 'Layout.sp?id=taxman&stats='||stat url,'' guid from tax_trkhdr */
select '全部事务('||count(*)||')' name,'Layout.sp?id=taxadmdsk&FILTER=' url from tax_trkhdr where todept in (select deptid from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') union all select '已分派('||count(*)||')' name,'Layout.sp?id=taxadmdsk&FILTER=and tousr is not null' url from tax_trkhdr where todept in (select deptid from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') and tousr is not null and stat<>'0' union all select '未分派('||count(*)||')' name,'Layout.sp?id=taxadmdsk&FILTER=and tousr is null' url from tax_trkhdr where todept in (select deptid from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') and tousr is null and stat<>'0'
